description: Earthy truffle takes this simple mushroom fettuccine dish to the next level.
name: Mushroom & Truffle Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving a couple of tbs of starchy water.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the mushrooms for 8-10 minutes, add the garlic and spinach and cook for 1-2 minutes to wilt. Add the stock and cook for 2 minutes to evaporate. Stir in the cream and cook for 2-3 minutes to thicken.
Tip the fettuccine into the pan and toss to coat, adding starchy water as necessary. Serve with parmesan and a drizzle of truffle oil to taste.
